ModulePrefs.title: Google Election Center app for Egypt on localhost
ModulePrefs.description: Enter your home address to find your voter registration information, voting location and more. Embed this app on your website or blog to help others find this important information.
ModulePrefs.author: Google, Inc.

UserPref.name: homePrompt
UserPref.default_value: Get your voter info! Enter the *full home address* where you’re registered to vote, including city and state:

Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript">
	
	var opt = {
		// Change the debug path as needed - use your own hostname and path
		debug: 'localhost/election-gadgets/hg/voter-info/',
		codeUrl: 'http://voter-info-2012-test.googlecode.com/hg/voter-info/',
		gadgetUrl: 'http://voter-info-2012-test.googlecode.com/hg/voter-info/voter-info-gadget-egypt.xml',
		localJS: 'voter-info-egypt.js',
		
		MODULE_ID: __MODULE_ID__,
		BIDI_START_EDGE: '__BIDI_START_EDGE__',
		BIDI_END_EDGE: '__BIDI_END_EDGE__',
		BIDI_DIR: '__BIDI_DIR__',
		BIDI_REVERSE_DIR: '__BIDI_REVERSE_DIR__',
		
		writeScript: function( name, seconds ) {
			document.write(
				'<script type="text/javascript" src="', opt.codeUrl + name, '">',
				'<\/script>'
			);
		}
	};
	
	if( opt.debug ) opt.codeUrl = 'http://' + opt.debug;
	opt.writeScript( 'voter-info.js' );
	
</script>
